title: Real-world outcomes of micropulse transscleral laser therapy in glaucoma patients: Efficacy of initial and repeated treatment, transient intraocular pressure spikes
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Thomas Dervos, Laura L. Fortuna, Konstantin Gugleta, Hendrik P.N. Scholl, Zisis Gatzioufas, Pascal W. Hasler, Valentin Arabin, Tim J. Enz
